text: Sunny Day is an American animated series that aired on Nick Jr. through 2017 to 2020. It is about a hair stylist named Sunny (voiced by Lila Crawford) and her dog Doodle and her two best friends Rox (voiced by Ã‰lan Luz Rivera), who colors hair and Blair (voiced by Taylor Louderman), who paints nails. ==References== Category:2017 Canadian television series debuts Category:2020 Canadian television series endings Category:American animated television series
title: Sunny Day (TV series)
